title: lord_icon
author: lord_icon
content: where are the antminers manufactured ?does anyone know the place of manufacture where an antminer is made ?The manufacturer is located in Beijing. But is it also produced there?Say: Does anyone have the address ?THANKS

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: lord_icon on October 22, 2023, 04:49:48 PMwhere are the antminers manufactured ?does anyone know the place of manufacture where an antminer is made ?The manufacturer is located in Beijing. But is it also produced there?Say: Does anyone have the address ?THANKSNo, the manufacturer is NOT located in Beijing, that's only the headquarters "office", there is another company called Shenzhen Century Cloud Core Technologies Limited which runs under Bitmain (it manufactures the mining gears ) and is located in Shenzhen (2,000 KM away from Beijing).Bitmain also manufactures the same ASIC miners in another factory located in Malaysia.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: If you want to buy a large batch of ASICs, then it is better to contact through official websites. Shenzhen is known for its electronics markets in China; there are a lot of intermediaries there who can sell low-quality goods.Or do you want to take a tour of the factory?
